text: The 1978–79 NCAA Division I men's basketball rankings was made up of two human polls, the AP Poll and the Coaches Poll, in addition to various other preseason polls. ==Legend== {| style="border:1px solid black;" | style="background:#D8FFEB; width:20px;" | | | Increase in ranking |- | style="background:#FFE6E6; width:20px;" | | | Decrease in ranking |- | style="background:#FFFFE6; width:20px;" | | | New to rankings from previous week |- | Italics | | Number of first place votes |- | (#–#) | | Win-loss record |- | т | | Tied with team above or below also with this symbol |} == AP Poll == == UPI Poll == == References == *1978-79 NCAA Division I men's basketball rankings Category:College men's basketball rankings in the United States
title: 1978–79 NCAA Division I men's basketball rankings
